message: This is a fair starting point, Bob. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
Alice, let's be practical. This offer benefits us both while acknowledging the time pressure we face.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe we can find a more equitable solution. This offer is closer to what I believe is fair, given the dwindling value of the money.
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point, considering the time pressure and the decreasing value of the money. Let's end this.
